title: In addition to Taric, here's Fire Diana!
body:
https://36.media.tumblr.com/a706957c93bd26364b083ff1feae7b1f/tumblr_inline_o56cjc6JdN1szu6pa_540.jpg

I hope she has cool effects

replies.body:
She does! :D 

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TLL6KG483n0/VwQG4OG-9xI/AAAAAAAAM-c/Jhz6okFRpg0rYqcPzC-ZP6m-hGZFAbt3A/s1600/lMaI9FQ.png

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=gwQdM8N0,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-04-05T21:16:11.896+0000)
>
> She does! :D 
> 
> https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TLL6KG483n0/VwQG4OG-9xI/AAAAAAAAM-c/Jhz6okFRpg0rYqcPzC-ZP6m-hGZFAbt3A/s1600/lMaI9FQ.png

What made you guys decide to give her short hair? I love the weapon and armor, but her face and hair seem really strange to me. I was really hoping you guys would keep that eye make up she has in like every skin and the symbol on her forehead. This just doesn't feel like Diana right now without it. I also think something like pure white eyes instead of orange would make this feel better. Because right now they all just blend together.

Her hair is still lengthy, part of it being a trail of fire/flames, as opposed to just solid hair. (Angles in the images may have not been the best to showcase that. D:)

The makeup she originally had was related to the moon/her base theme, and in this case, doesn't make much sense for the thematic. We do similar things, like removing Jinx's tattoos for Mafia Jinx, if we don't feel like a detail strengthens the new skin.

I'd be happy to pass along the feedback regarding her eyes. ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=gwQdM8N0,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2016-04-05T23:05:41.975+0000)
>
> Her hair is still lengthy, part of it being a trail of fire/flames, as opposed to just solid hair. (Angles in the images may have not been the best to showcase that. D:)
> 
> The makeup she originally had was related to the moon/her base theme, and in this case, doesn't make much sense for the thematic. We do similar things, like removing Jinx's tattoos for Mafia Jinx, if we don't feel like a detail strengthens the new skin.
> 
> I'd be happy to pass along the feedback regarding her eyes. ^-^

1 last thing. Would it be possible for you guys to re-colour her skin to her human skin and then have us vote on which we like better orange or normal skin tone? After all it was by voting that brought this skin to happen in the first place. I think it would solve many issues, hair blending with face, orange eyes, ect. I'd def be 100% on board if it was like that. Keep the flaming hair, the armor everything else the same and just change up the skin colour.

Right, the voting did choose the champion, and the games chose the thematic. 

I spoke with the QA chick on this,  and we don't have plans to change the color of her body because she is meant to be on fire, as opposed to having exposed human skin. This was something we discussed in the development of the skin. We appreciate the feedback, though!

So Miss. Dr. Flapjack's Fiance, is she supposed to be on fire or to be fire??? The skin looks good, dont get me wrong. Bumping up the richness of the blacks a tad would really make her pop imo. but great jobs to you and your team!
Yes, she's meant to be more on fire, as opposed to made of fire.

> [{quoted}](name=L0RD AZIR,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=gwQdM8N0,comment-id=0003000000000002,timestamp=2016-04-06T03:26:11.411+0000)
>
> 1 last thing. Would it be possible for you guys to re-colour her skin to her human skin and then have us vote on which we like better orange or normal skin tone? After all it was by voting that brought this skin to happen in the first place. I think it would solve many issues, hair blending with face, orange eyes, ect. I'd def be 100% on board if it was like that. Keep the flaming hair, the armor everything else the same and just change up the skin colour.

.

>random  whining about the model sucks so rito must hate Diana

.

>3 months of asking when the skin that was just decided on was going to come out

what the f is wrong with Diana players

Appreciate the response, I've been waiting for a new Diana skin for sooo long. So pretty hyped about this

Is this skin still legacy as mentioned when the poll was made during the Fire vs Ice event?
No, she is not legacy.

Hi Katey, 

If you have time, please read the thread i made for this Diana skin. Thanks in advance.
Link?

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/AK0gEwx5-infernal-diana

Here it is! Thanks Katey boo!! :* XO
Fireball Diana! I love it :3

Aaaand of course the model sucks again, Riot is basically confirming hates Diana.

whats next, MORE Diana nerfs?

PD: fuck Boobplate Diana.

Model viewer isn't the best in terms of judging a new skin, as it lacks lighting and what she'd look like from in game height. Here's a more clear shot of what she's going to look like - 

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-20JEbfMqm_0/VwQZHz2oryI/AAAAAAAANDI/uTgXImIP13EQF9BWo15f_lWLR7lrCSgMw/s1600/dianaturn.jpg

Also particles - 

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TLL6KG483n0/VwQG4OG-9xI/AAAAAAAAM-c/Jhz6okFRpg0rYqcPzC-ZP6m-hGZFAbt3A/s1600/lMaI9FQ.png

If you have a PBE account, I'd love to hear your feedback once you get your hands on the skin in game. Otherwise, if you have feedback after checking her out via videos, etc., that works, too! ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=gwQdM8N0,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-04-05T21:15:46.587+0000)

> 
> If you have a PBE account, I'd love to hear your feedback once you get your hands on the skin in game. Otherwise, if you have feedback after checking her out via videos, etc., that works, too! ^-^

I've played a lot of Diana and I love this new skin! So beautiful! :)

I saw her being played on PBE, but I had difficulty being able to tell when her passive was up. If you could make that more noticeable, that would be nicer both for her information as well as making it fair to her enemies.
Thank you for the feedback! :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=gwQdM8N0,comment-id=0001000000040000,timestamp=2016-04-08T16:39:23.497+0000)
>
> Thank you for the feedback! :)

Do you guys ever change the laugh of a champion? I'd pay some serious RP to get a new sound pack for her laugh in particular. Heh. :)
Higher tier skins receive new VO, which includes new emotes. :)

> Here's a more clear shot of what **he's** going to look like -

So rude to Diana! Referring to her as a he. Hehe. :P
FFFFF, typing too fast. XD Edited!

By the way Katey, I made a reply to you a week ago on a very old thread of mine you responded to a while back. I'm sure you get too many replies to see it though, but the item set bug is still occurring 3 months later where the shop inaccurately displays you as having less gold (sometimes negative!) than what you actually own. D: Was this bug forgotten about, or is it still being worked on? ><

I actually have that thread open, and was going to reply today. :P 

http://imgur.com/QqK3BEl

Unfortunately, I don't have any updates for you. :c It doesn't appear to be of highest priority at the moment.
seeing the skin spotlight I think you guys did a good job and I look forward to buying her when she comes out ;3
Katey I've been waiting patiently for this skin since it's announcement and as a Diana main I must say: This is beautiful, thank you so much ^_^
Phew, that's awesome to hear! Diana is a tough lady to work with! ^-^
Oh she's very grumpy, but she's got good jokes.
I literally just laughed out loud thinking of them.
i don't think any effect will change the fact is wearing a boobplate...
Your obsession with the word aside, this game is not realistic, if you haven't noticed. It's called fantasy. To say champions armors should be realistic is stupid nonsense.
Red/Gold flame... isn't that like Leona's?
Well i has Boobplate, so maybe.

Well, I called it. Fire-recolor Diana.

Having played her on the pbe, I feel like this skin is more of a relaunch of Wild-fire Zyra. Her Q has a fire woosh or something like that, her hair is blinding orange to the point that you cant see the out of place floating gem crown thing and her backing animation makes no sense.

This is the skin that stopped Diana from getting a Blood Moon skin. It should have been a REAL 1350 skin, not a "we felt like 975 wouldn't be enough for a voted recolor and a different weapon" skin. We were told it was going to be a awesome themed cool skin of amazingness to make up for the Blood Moon skip, but there is no theme. The model looks like they just changed her pallet to a fire/lava pallet. This skin should have been on level with Haunted Zyra where the only thing resembling the base skin was the vines on the ult. The only change this skin brings is the fire trail from her Q. The shield is just orange, the E poof is just orange. Her passive aoe is just orange. But I guess throwing in a boob plate for the fanboys is something.

Blood Moon Diana? No, you get 975 for 1350 Orange Diana.

Wish it had been a lightning themed yellow recolor instead, that way we could have atleast had Banana Diana.
http://33.media.tumblr.com/2be2554874d0e47605127c54fec704cf/tumblr_inline_mzo0awUpoF1sn1zi7.jpg
